about_the_game:
No fear of domination by pay-to-win players, just plenty of free benefits, easy socialization, and strategic combat.

Game Introduction
1.Game Background
This is a fantasy world of swords and magic, where continents of different times and civilizations intertwine. Legend has it that in ancient times, demons roamed freely. To save humanity, the gods used their last strength to expel the demons from Yggdrasil, leaving behind magical crystals to protect the land from demonic invasion.
As time passed, the power of the crystals gradually faded. When the crystal's light dimmed, the first summoners built the Summoner's Academy around it, deciding to protect their home with human strength alone.

Centuries later, an evil summoner, having strayed from the path, destroyed the academy and sought to use the academy's crystal to summon demons again. In a final effort, the academy head decided to shatter the crystal, issuing a command to all summoners in the world to protect the crystal of the academy.

You are a novice summoner just starting out. Fate has led you to obtain the first shard of the academy's crystal. The overture to adventure has been written. The rest of the story is yours to write...

2.Game Features
Reject pay-to-win, sign in for diamonds.
Automatic combat, say no to grinding.
Humorous storyline, hilarious dialogues.
Adorable heroes, open continuous draws.
Exquisite character designs, enjoyable collection.
Multiple growth paths, easy cultivation.
Diverse dungeons, varied gameplay.
3.Gameplay
Main storyline dungeons, battles, and narrative progression, spirit collection and cultivation, strategic combat combinations.
Light Roguelike treasure hunting and maze gameplay.
Various PVE dungeons and PVP challenge modes.
Player socialization: friends, guilds.
Fantasy homeland system: home building, player interaction.
Phantom beast system: hatch phantom beasts to aid in battle.
Castle pursuer system: repair mech castles, repel pursuers, collect treasure, and enhance spirit combat power.

short_description: he Girl's Moving Castle is an RPG focusing on companion collection and growth, strategic battles, and idle progression, with light interactions. It offers a no-grind, no-pay experience, with daily free rewards, ensuring an easy, premium game experience without spending.
supported_languages: English, Indonesian, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
